title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the contents of the field correctly.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a database field with different types of content: 
   - HTML text within <html> tag
   - HTML fragments not within <html> tag
   - Text with RTF tags
2. Add a dynamic text element to display the field content.
3. Observe that the dynamic text element does not render the content correctly as expected.
